participant_abstract.sent: The final meeting was primarily to wrap up the project.
The ID and UID presented the prototype and it was then evaluated according to the Marketing evals and project evals.
We went over the costs of production and determined that it was within our budget.
We then wrapped up the project by discussing our reactions and personal opinions on the project.

participant_decisions.sent: The product is satisfactory, meets expectations.
The product is produced within the budget.
